entry.title: New release for Requestly: April 28, 2025
entry.content:
What's Changed

🐛 Fixes

  • Fixed tabs navigation reset issue
  • Fixed rule status syncing bug
  • Fixed disappearing environment table row on duplicate keys
  • Fixed local sync tabs regression
  • Fixed member count issue in billing dashboard
  • Fixed an issue where code in the editor was not persisted after saving or reopening a Script Rule.
  • Fixed a missing Export cURL option in the API Client.

🛠️ Improvements

  • Refactored tabs for better performance

entry.title: New release for Requestly: May 12, 2025
entry.content:
What's Changed

🚀 New

• Requestly joins BrowserStack to build the future of application testing. Read announcement

🛠️ Improvements

• Improved API Client sidebar and header styling for better visual clarity • Replaced API Client toasts with Ant Design notifications for consistency

🐛 Fixes

• Fixed fullscreen toggle not working in Rule & Mocks editor • Fixed user role not updating in a workspace issues • Resolved scroll issues across the app • Addressed recent crashes causing app instability

entry.title: New release for Requestly: Jun 2, 2025
entry.content:
What's Changed

🐛 Bug Fixes

  • API Client no longer crashes when viewed in a logged-out state.
  • Fixed issues where request body positioning caused confusion — now properly moved to the bottom.
  • Fixed unexpected error when a user aborts execution in the API Client.
  • Rule editor’s bottom panel scroll issues and bottom sheet overflow problems are now fixed for smoother navigation.

entry.title: New release for Requestly: Jun 11, 2025
entry.content:
What's Changed

🚀 New

  • Added support for viewing error files in Local Workspaces for API client. Read more about Local Workspaces here.
  • Introduced Handlebars-like templating in the File Server to make your mock responses more dynamic and context-aware

🛠️ Improvements

  • Toolbar options in the code editor are now accessible in fullscreen mode.
  • Improved Variable autocomplete experience. now properly appends closing curly braces.
  • Resolved several usability issues and bugs to improve overall functionality of the API client.

entry.title: New release for Requestly: June 16, 2025
entry.content:
What's Changed

🛠️ Improvements

  • API client cookies are now set using the Set-Cookie header and are included in subsequent requests.
  • API Client now shows a clearer message instead of just "Failed to fetch" when there's a DNS resolution error.

🐛 Fixes

  • Fixed an issue where the unsaved changes indicator didn’t disappear after saving changes with updated query parameters.
  • Resolved a cursor jump issue in the editor for a smoother typing experience.
  • Fixed broken key-value pair parsing that caused incorrect behavior in some rules.
  • Boolean values now render properly across the app, instead of being hidden or misrepresented.
